# outputPixelFormatType

**Instance Property**

The desired pixel format type of the observation.

## Declaration

```swift
final var outputPixelFormatType: OSType { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreVideo/kCVPixelFormatType_TwoComponent32Float].

## Configuring a request

- **computationAccuracy**: The level of accuracy to compute the optical flow.
- **TrackOpticalFlowRequest.ComputationAccuracy**: A type that describes the computational accuracy.
- **supportedOutputPixelFormatTypes**: The collection of supported pixel format types.
